Articles.Content:
Hello I want you for B.I.S.A.!! Just kidding, not a recruiting forum. I want you to give me planes, tanks, and Artillery ( Howitzer or Self Propelled ) and I will build it.

Get Creative! It doesn't even have to be real! A good Fan art pic would get me started! Happy thinking and I will Happy build!
Certainly you can attempt a Wright Flyer?
Ill see what I can do Maximus! Oh and btw I can only work on theses things on Thursdays and every other weekend so yeah but it'll keep me busy guys!
imgur.com/saZ9JJU heres the plane! lol sorry it took a long time, the router kept dying and KSP crashed before I saved it, sorry XP
